comments.en:
Multifunction device: printer/scanner/copier/fax. The integrated flatbed scanner has an automatic document feeder and is legal-sized.

For basic printing functionality use the Postscript PPD. For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS). NOTE: The PostScript PPD which is downloadable here is from HP, but is not included in the HPLIP package (HPLIP would simply use a PCL PPD). To get the best out of this printer use HPLIP together with the PostScript PPD from here.

Best output quality reachable with the HPLIP driver, especially the 1200-dpi high resolution mode gives excellent photo quality.

When used with HP's HPLIP driver, this printer auto-detects the paper type and does appropriate dithering and colour adjustment internally, controlled by the hardware. So even when Ghostscript with the HPLIP driver only renders the image with 300 or 600 dpi, the 2400x1200 dpi are used for the internal dithering. So if you insert photo paper, the printer will print in its highest quality, no paper type choice in the driver's options is needed. There is also a special high resolution mode where the image is rendered in 1200 dpi, without paper detection, intended for photo paper only.

Copying works fine from the front panel.

Consumables/Refills: HP 10 black, HP 11 color
